name: Ristretto
steps: Grind your coffee finer than usual
Brew 0.75oz of espresso during 15 seconds max
Aim to yield the same weight coffee beans used (1:1)
For example, 8g of coffee beans should yield 8g of espresso in a 1:1 ratio

name: Espresso
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds
Aim to yield twice the weight of coffee beans (1:2 ratio)
For example, 8g of coffee beans should yield 16g of espresso in a 1:2 ratio

name: Espresso Doppio
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds
Aim to yield twice the weight of coffee beans (1:2 ratio)
For example, 17g of coffee beans should yield 34g of espresso in a 1:2 ratio

name: Cubano
steps: Mix coffee with brown sugar to yield 2oz of espresso
Brew coffee and brown sugar mixture during 18-25 seconds
Aim to yield twice the weight of coffee beans and brown sugar (1:2 ratio)
For example, 20g of coffee beans and brown sugar should yield 40g of espresso in a 1:2 ratio

name: Espresso con Panna
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Add 0.5oz of heavy cream to balance bitter taste

name: Espresso Romano
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Add 1oz of lemon juice
Add lemon zest on top
Top with a lemon slice

name: Caffè Corretto
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Add 1oz of brandy (sambuca, grappa, cognac, pisco, etc)

name: Caffè Amaretto
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Add 0.5oz of amaretto
Add 0.5oz of half and half

name: Espressino
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds (see Espresso)
Froth 1oz of cold milk until warm but no foam is present
Remove any foam with a spoon
Add frothed milk to coffee

name: Piccolo Latte
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds (see Espresso)
Froth 1oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top of coffee

name: Café con Hielo
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds (see Espresso)
Add some ice cubes

name: Caffè Freddo
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Add some ice cubes

name: Iced Espresso
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds (see Espresso)
Mix coffee with 1oz of cold milk and 1oz of simple syrup
Pour mixture over demitasse with ice cubes on it

name: Café del Tiempo
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds (see Espresso)
Add lemon slice

name: Café Bombón
steps: Add 1oz of condensed milk on a demitasse
Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds (see Espresso)
Add coffee to demitasse
Froth 1oz of cold milk until foamy
Add foam on top of drink

name: Raf
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds (see Espresso)
Add 1.5 tablespoons of vanilla sugar to coffee
Top drink with 1oz of cream

name: Marocchino
steps: Make 0.5oz of hot chocolate
Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds (see Espresso)
Mix in 1oz of warm milk
Add hot chocolate
Add cocoa powder on top

name: Caffè Affogato
steps: Add 2 scoops of vanilla ice cream to a 5oz tasse
Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds (see Espresso)
Add coffee on top of ice cream
Add cocoa powder on top

name: Café Glacé
steps: Add 150g of vanilla ice cream to a 5oz tasse
Add 20g of ground chocolate on top
Brew 4oz of espresso (2 espresso doppios during 20-35 seconds each, see Espresso Doppio)
Add coffee to cup

name: Mazagran
steps: Add 1 teaspoon of brown sugar to a 5oz tasse
Brew 3oz of espresso during 40 seconds max (see Lungo)
Add coffee and 1.5oz of lemon juice to cup
Add some ice cubes
Top with a lemon slice

name: Caffè Breve
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Froth 2oz of cold half and half until foamy
Add frothed half and half on top of coffee

name: Cortado
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Froth 2oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top of coffee

name: Cortadito
steps: Mix coffee with brown sugar to yield 2oz of espresso (see Cubano)
Brew coffee and brown sugar mixture during 18-25 seconds
Froth 2oz of cold milk until warm and microfoam is present
Add a little frothed milk to coffee, thin layer of foam

name: Macchiato
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Froth 1oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Stain coffee with frothed milk, pouring over a small area

name: Lungo
steps: Grind your coffee coarser than usual
Brew 3oz of espresso during 40 seconds max
Aim to yield thrice the weight of coffee beans (1:3 ratio)
For example, 17g of coffee beans should yield 51g of espresso in a 1:3 ratio

name: Caffè Crema
steps: Grind your coffee much coarser than usual
Brew 4oz of espresso during 40 seconds max
Aim to yield thrice the weight of coffee beans (1:3 ratio)
For example, 17g of coffee beans should yield 51g of espresso in a 1:3 ratio

name: Flat White
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Froth 3oz of cold milk until as silky as possible and a thin layer of microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top of coffee

name: Americano
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Add 4oz of hot water to coffee

name: Long Black
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds on a demitasse (see Espresso Doppio)
Add 4oz of hot water to a 7oz tasse
Pour coffee on hot water, to preserve crema

name: Café con Leche
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds on a demitasse (see Espresso Doppio)
Froth 3oz of cold milk until warm and foamy
Add milk to coffee
Stir in 2 tablespoons of sugar

name: Café Borgia
steps: Make 4oz of hot chocolate
Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Add hot chocolate to coffee
Add whipped cream on top with cinammon and orange peel zest

name: Cappuccino
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Froth 4oz of cold milk until silky and foamy
Stir cup to stain the walls with coffee
Pour frothed milk from the long side, in the center of the cup
Make sure to have foam at the top
Add cocoa powder on top

name: Café au Lait
steps: Brew 3oz of espresso for 40 seconds max (see Lungo)
Froth 3oz of cold milk until foamy and silky
Reserve the foam before mixing with coffee
Add frothed milk to coffee
Add foam on top

name: Caffè Latte
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Froth 3oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Pour frother milk from the beak, in 2 steps
First, add from a higher distance and mix in milk with the stream
Second, add from a lower distance and cut the milk forward

name: Matcha Latte
steps: Sift 2 teaspoons of matcha into a cappuccino mug
Pour 2oz of water on mug and stir until matcha dissolves
Froth 4oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top of matcha
Matcha is naturally sweet so no sugar is usually needed

name: Chai Latte
steps: Make 2oz of concentrated chai tea using 2oz of water and a 1oz of chai spices/black tea
Pour tea onto a cappuccino mug
Froth 4oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top of tea
Decorate with some cinnammon powder on top

name: Dirty Chai
steps: Make 2oz of chai tea using 2oz of water and a 1oz of chai spices/black tea
Pour tea onto a cappuccino mug
Brew 2oz of espresso for 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Pour coffee onto mug and mix
Froth 3oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top of mug

name: Mocha
steps: Make 2oz of hot chocolate
Pour chocolate onto a cappuccino mug
Brew 2oz of espresso for 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Pour coffee onto mug and mix
Froth 2oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top
Add whipped cream with cocoa powder sprinkles to top off drink

name: Vienna
steps: Make 2oz of hot chocolate
Pour chocolate onto a cappuccino mug
Brew 2oz of espresso for 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Pour coffee onto mug and mix
Froth 3oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top
Add whipped cream with cocoa powder sprinkles to top off drink

name: Red Eye
steps: Make 4oz of dripped coffee (can use french press or mocha pot as well)
Pour coffee onto a cappuccino mug
Brew 1oz of espresso during 15 seconds onto a demitasse (see Espresso)
Pour espresso onto cappuccino mug

name: Black Eye
steps: Make 4oz of dripped coffee (can use french press or mocha pot as well)
Pour coffee onto a cappuccino mug
Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds onto a demitasse (see Espresso Doppio)
Pour espresso onto cappuccino mug

name: Dead Eye
steps: Make 4oz of dripped coffee (can use french press or mocha pot as well)
Pour coffee onto a cappuccino mug
Brew 3oz of espresso for 40 seconds max onto a 5oz tasse (see Lungo)
Pour espresso onto cappuccino mug

name: Lazy Eye
steps: Make 4oz of dripped decaf coffee (can use french press or mocha pot as well)
Pour coffee onto a cappuccino mug
Brew 3oz of espresso for 40 seconds max onto a 5oz tasse (see Lungo)
Pour espresso onto cappuccino mug

name: Cà Phê Sữa Đá
steps: Add 1oz of condensed milk to a tumbler glass
Get the darkest coffee you have
Grind your coffee finer than usual
Slow brew 6oz of espresso (3 espresso doppios during 20-35 seconds each, see Espresso Doppio)
Stir the coffee with the condensed milk
Add some ice
Froth 1oz of cold milk until foamy and add on top

name: Syrup Latte
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso for 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Add 1oz of simple syrup
Froth 4oz of cold milk until silky and microfoam is present
Add frothed milk on top of coffee

name: Latte Macchiato
steps: Froth 5oz of cold milk until foamy and silky
Pour milk onto a tumbler glass
Let the milk sit, so that the foam separates from the milk
Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds onto a demitasse (see Espresso Doppio)
Stain milk with espresso, pouring over a small area, slowly

name: Caramel Macchiato
steps: Froth 5oz of cold milk until foamy and silky
Pour milk onto a tumbler glass
Let the milk sit, so that the foam separates from the milk
Brew 2oz of espresso during 18-25 seconds onto a demitasse (see Espresso Doppio)
Stain milk with espresso, pouring over a small area, slowly
Add caramel drizzle on top of foam

name: Frappé
steps: Blend 2oz of instant coffee and 0.5oz of sugar with 5.5oz milk
Pour mixture onto a tumbler glass with ice cubes
Add whipped cream with cocoa powder sprinkles to top off drink

name: Galão
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso for 18-25 seconds (see Espresso Doppio)
Froth 5oz of cold milk until foamy and silky
Add frothed milk on top
Add sugar to taste

name: Irish Coffee
steps: Brew 4oz of espresso (2 espresso doppios during 20-35 seconds each, see Espresso Doppio)
Add 1 teaspoon of brown sugar to an 11oz tumbler glass
Add 2.5oz of heavy cream
Add 2oz of whiskey, the coffee, and whipped cream on top

name: Beerpresso
steps: Brew 2oz of espresso for 18-25 seconds onto a demitasse (see Espresso Doppio)
Fill a tumbler glass with ice cubes and beer (lager or shandy)
Add coffee and stir

name: Paloma
steps: Brew 1oz of espresso for 15 seconds onto a demitasse (see Espresso)
Add ice and 4oz of tonic water to a tumbler glass
Fill a shaker with 1oz of lemon juice, lemon syrup, 1oz of grapefruit juice, 2oz of tequila, the espresso, and some ice
Strain mix onto tumbler glass
